018package org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.internal;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static java.nio.file.Files.createDirectories;
022import static java.nio.file.Files.exists;
023import static java.nio.file.Files.notExists;
024import static java.nio.file.Files.readAllLines;
025import static java.nio.file.Files.writeString;
026import static java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption.CREATE;
027import static java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption.WRITE;
028import static java.util.Comparator.comparing;
029import static java.util.regex.Pattern.compile;
030import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
031import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.UTF8;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.breakText;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmpty;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmptyOrBlank;
041
042import java.io.IOException;
043import java.nio.file.Path;
044import java.text.Collator;
045import java.time.Clock;
046import java.time.Instant;
047import java.util.ArrayList;
048import java.util.Collection;
049import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
050import java.util.List;
051import java.util.Map;
052import java.util.Optional;
053import java.util.StringJoiner;
054import java.util.regex.Pattern;
055import java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException;
056import java.util.stream.Stream;
057
058import org.apiguardian.api.API;
059import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
060import org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.INIFile;
061import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Lazy;
062import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter;
063import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.stringconverter.PathStringConverter;
064
065/**
066 *  The implementation for
067 *  {@link INIFile}.
068 *
069 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
070 *  @version $Id: INIFileImpl.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $
071 *
072 *  @UMLGraph.link
073 *  @since 0.1.0
074 */
075@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: INIFileImpl.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $" )
076@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
077public final class INIFileImpl implements INIFile
078{
079        /*------------*\
080    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
081        \*------------*/
082    /**
083     *  The clock that is used to determine the last update. This is changed
084     *  only for testing purposes, the default is
085     *  {@link Clock#systemDefaultZone()}.
086     */
087    private Clock m_Clock = Clock.systemDefaultZone();
088
089    /**
090     *  The collator the is used for sorting the groups and entries if
091     *  requested.
092     */
093    private final Collator m_Collator;
094
095    /**
096     *  The comment for this file.
097     */
098    @SuppressWarnings( "StringBufferField" )
099    private final StringBuilder m_Comment = new StringBuilder();
100
101    /**
102     *  The reference to file that is used to persist the contents.
103     */
104    private final Path m_File;
105
106    /**
107     *  The groups.
108     */
109    private final Map<String,Group> m_Groups = new LinkedHashMap<>();
110
111    /**
112     *  The time when the file was last updated.
113     */
114    private Instant m_LastUpdated;
115
116        /*------------------------*\
117    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
118        \*------------------------*/
119    /**
120     *  The format String that is used for the last updated comment.
121     */
122    private static final String LAST_UPDATED_FORMAT;
123
124    /**
125     *  The pattern that is used for the last updated comment.
126     */
127    private static final Pattern LAST_UPDATED_PATTERN;
128
129    static
130    {
131        @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
132        final var s = "# Last Update: ";
133        LAST_UPDATED_FORMAT = format( "%s%%s", s );
134
135        try
136        {
137            LAST_UPDATED_PATTERN = compile( format( "%s(.*)$", s ) );
138        }
139        catch( final PatternSyntaxException e )
140        {
141            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
142        }
143    }
144
145        /*--------------*\
146    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
147        \*--------------*/
148    /**
149     *  <p>{@summary Creates a new instance of {@code INIFileImpl}.}</p>
150     *  <p>The constructor does not check whether the <i>file</i> argument is
151     *  {@code null}; this has to be done by the factory methods
152     *  {@link #create(Path)}
153     *  and
154     *  {@link #open(Path)}.</p>
155     *  <p>But this allows simpler tests.</p>
156     *
157     *  @param  file    The file that holds the contents.
158     */
159    public INIFileImpl( final Path file )
160    {
161        m_Collator = Collator.getInstance();
162        m_File = file;
163        m_LastUpdated = Instant.now( m_Clock );
164    }   //  INIFileImpl()
165
166        /*---------*\
167    ====** Methods **==========================================================
168        \*---------*/
169    /**
170     * {@inheritDoc}
171     */
172    @Override
173    public final void addComment( final String comment )
174    {
175        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( comment ) ) m_Comment.append( comment );
176    }   //  addComment()
177
178    /**
179     * {@inheritDoc}
180     */
181    @Override
182    public final void addComment( final String group, final String comment )
183    {
184        requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" );
185        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( comment ) )
186        {
187            @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
188            final var g = m_Groups.computeIfAbsent( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ), this::createGroup );
189            g.addComment( comment );
190        }
191    }   //  addComment()
192
193    /**
194     * {@inheritDoc}
195     */
196    @Override
197    public final void addComment( final String group, final String key, final String comment )
198    {
199        requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" );
200        requireNotEmptyArgument( key, "key" );
201        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( comment ) )
202        {
203            @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
204            final var g = m_Groups.computeIfAbsent( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ), this::createGroup );
205            g.addComment( key, comment );
206        }
207    }   //  addComment()
208
209    /**
210     *  Breaks the given String into chunks of
211     *  {@value #LINE_LENGTH}
212     *  characters. All but the last chunk will end with a backslash
213     *  (&quot;\&quot;).
214     *
215     *  @param  s   The String to split.
216     *  @return The stream with the chunks.
217     */
218    public static final Stream<String> breakString( final String s)
219    {
220        var remainder = requireNonNullArgument( s, "s" );
221        final var builder = Stream.<String>builder();
222        while( remainder.length() > LINE_LENGTH )
223        {
224            //noinspection ConstantExpression
225            builder.add( format( "%s\\", remainder.substring( 0, LINE_LENGTH - 1 ) ) );
226            remainder = remainder.substring( LINE_LENGTH );
227        }
228        builder.add( remainder );
229
230        final var retValue = builder.build();
231
232        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
233        return retValue;
234    }   //  breakString()
235
236    /**
237     *  <p>{@summary Creates an empty INI file.} If the file already exists, it
238     *  will be overwritten without notice.</p>
239     *  <p>The given file is used to store the value on a call to
240     *  {@link #save()}.</p>
241     *
242     *  @param  file    The file.
243     *  @return The new instance.
244     */
245    public static final INIFile create( final Path file )
246    {
247        final INIFile retValue = new INIFileImpl( requireNonNullArgument( file, "file" ) );
248
249        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
250        return retValue;
251    }   //  create()
252
253    /**
254     *  Creates a new instance of
255     *  {@link Group}
256     *  for the given name.
257     *
258     *  @param  group   The name of the group.
259     *  @return The new instance.
260     */
261    private final Group createGroup( final String group )
262    {
263        return new Group( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ) );
264    }   //  createGroup()
265
266    /**
267     *  Dumps the contents to a String.
268     *
269     *  @return The contents in a String.
270     */
271    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
272    public final String dumpContents()
273    {
274        final var joiner = new StringJoiner( "\n", EMPTY_STRING, "\n" );
275        if( !m_Comment.isEmpty() )
276        {
277            splitComment( m_Comment ).forEach( joiner::add );
278        }
279        joiner.add( format( LAST_UPDATED_FORMAT, m_LastUpdated.toString() ) );
280        final var retValue = m_Groups.values()
281            .stream()
282            .map( Group::toString )
283            .collect( joining( EMPTY_STRING, joiner.toString(), EMPTY_STRING ) );
284
285        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
286        return retValue;
287    }   //  dumpContents()
288
289    /**
290     *  {@inheritDoc}
291     */
292    @Override
293    public final Optional<String> getValue( final String group, final String key )
294    {
295        Optional<String> retValue = Optional.empty();
296        if( isNotEmpty( group ) )
297        {
298            @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
299            final var g = m_Groups.get( group );
300            if( nonNull( g ) )
301            {
302                retValue = g.getValue( key )
303                    .map( Value::getValue );
304            }
305        }
306
307        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
308        return retValue;
309    }   //  getValue()
310
311    /**
312     *  {@inheritDoc}
313     */
314    @Override
315    public final <T> Optional<T> getValue( final String group, final String key, final StringConverter<? extends T> stringConverter )
316    {
317        requireNonNullArgument( stringConverter, "stringConverter" );
318        final Optional<T> retValue = getValue( group, key )
319            .map( stringConverter::fromString );
320
321        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
322        return retValue;
323    }   //  getValue()
324
325    /**
326     *  {@inheritDoc}
327     */
328    @Override
329    public final boolean hasGroup( final String group )
330    {
331        return isNotEmptyOrBlank( group ) && m_Groups.containsKey( group );
332    }   //  hasGroup()
333
334    /**
335     *  {@inheritDoc}
336     */
337    @Override
338    public final boolean hasValue( final String group, final String key )
339    {
340        return getValue( group, key ).isPresent();
341    }   //  hasValue()
342
343    /**
344     *  Join all lines that end with a backslash with the next line on the
345     *  list.
346     *
347     *  @param  lines   The input lines.
348     *  @return The output.
349     */
350    private final List<String> joinLines( final Iterable<String> lines )
351    {
352        final List<String> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
353
354        final var buffer = new StringBuilder();
355        for( final var line : lines )
356        {
357            if( line.endsWith( "\\" ) )
358            {
359                buffer.append( line );
360                buffer.setLength( buffer.length() - 1 );
361            }
362            else if( buffer.isEmpty() )
363            {
364                retValue.add( line );
365            }
366            else
367            {
368                buffer.append( line );
369                retValue.add( buffer.toString() );
370                buffer.setLength( 0 );
371            }
372        }
373        if( !buffer.isEmpty() ) retValue.add( buffer.toString() );
374
375        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
376        return retValue;
377    }   //  joinLines()
378
379    /**
380     *  {@inheritDoc}
381     */
382    @Override
383    public final Collection<Entry> listEntries()
384    {
385        final List<Entry> buffer = new ArrayList<>();
386        for( final var group : m_Groups.keySet() )
387        {
388            @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
389            final var g = m_Groups.get( group );
390            for( final var key : g.getKeys() )
391            {
392                final var value = g.getValue( key );
393                buffer.add( new Entry( group, key, value.map( Value::getValue ).orElse( null ) ) );
394            }
395        }
396        buffer.sort( comparing( Entry::group, m_Collator ).thenComparing( Entry::key, m_Collator ) );
397        final var retValue = List.copyOf( buffer );
398
399        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
400        return retValue;
401    }   //  listEntries()
402
403    /**
404     *  Opens the given INI file and reads its contents. If the file does not
405     *  exist yet, a new, empty file will be created.
406     *
407     *  @param  file    The file.
408     *  @return The new instance.
409     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the file.
410     */
411    public static final INIFile open( final Path file ) throws IOException
412    {
413        final var retValue = new INIFileImpl( requireNonNullArgument( file, "file" ) );
414        retValue.parse();
415
416        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
417        return retValue;
418    }   //  open()
419
420    /**
421     *  Loads the content from the file into memory.
422     *
423     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the file.
424     */
425    private final void parse() throws IOException
426    {
427        if( exists( m_File ) )
428        {
429            final var lines = joinLines( readAllLines( m_File, UTF8 ) );
430            parse( lines );
431        }
432    }   //  parse()
433
434    /**
435     *  Parses the given lines to the INI file contents.
436     *
437     *  @param  lines   The joined lines; the list does not contain any
438     *      multi-line constructs.
439     *  @throws IOException The structure is invalid.
440     */
441    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
442    public final void parse( final List<String> lines ) throws IOException
443    {
444        Group currentGroup = null;
445        final Collection<String> commentBuffer = new ArrayList<>();
446        m_Comment.setLength( 0 );
447        var commentsToBuffer = false;
448
449        final var errorMessage = Lazy.use( () -> "'%s' has invalid structure".formatted( PathStringConverter.INSTANCE.toString( m_File ) ) );
450
451        final var groupPattern = compile( "\\[(.*)]" );
452        ScanLoop: for( final var line : requireNonNullArgument( lines, "lines" ) )
453        {
454            var matcher = LAST_UPDATED_PATTERN.matcher( line );
455            if( matcher.matches() )
456            {
457                m_LastUpdated = Instant.parse( matcher.group( 1 ) );
458                continue ScanLoop;
459            }
460
461            if( line.startsWith( "#" ) )
462            {
463                //---* Comment line found *------------------------------------
464                @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
465                final var s = (line.length() > 1 ? line.substring( 1 ).trim() : EMPTY_STRING);
466                if( commentsToBuffer )
467                {
468                    commentBuffer.add( s );
469                }
470                else
471                {
472                    m_Comment.append( s );
473                }
474                continue ScanLoop;
475            }
476
477            matcher = groupPattern.matcher( line );
478            if( matcher.matches() )
479            {
480                final var name = matcher.group( 1 );
481                currentGroup = createGroup( name );
482                m_Groups.put( name, currentGroup );
483                commentBuffer.forEach( currentGroup::addComment );
484                commentBuffer.clear();
485                continue ScanLoop;
486            }
487
488            if( line.isBlank() )
489            {
490                commentsToBuffer = true;
491                continue ScanLoop;
492            }
493
494            if( isNull( currentGroup) ) throw new IOException( errorMessage.get() );
495            final var pos = line.indexOf( '=' );
496            if( pos < 1 ) throw new IOException( errorMessage.get() );
497            final var key = line.substring( 0, pos ).trim();
498            final var data = line.length() > pos ? line.substring( pos + 1 ).trim() : EMPTY_STRING;
499            final var value = currentGroup.setValue( key, data );
500            commentBuffer.forEach( value::addComment );
501            commentBuffer.clear();
502        }   //  ScanLoop:
503    }   //  parse()
504
505    /**
506     *  {@inheritDoc}
507     */
508    @Override
509    public final void refresh() throws IOException { parse(); }
510
511    /**
512     *  Saves the contents of the INI file to the file that was provided to
513     *  {@link #create(Path)}
514     *  or
515     *  {@link #open(Path)}.
516     *
517     *  @throws IOException  A problem occurred when writing the contents to
518     *      the file.
519     */
520    @Override
521    public final void save() throws IOException
522    {
523        if( notExists( m_File ) )
524        {
525            final var folder = m_File.getParent();
526            if( notExists( folder ) ) createDirectories( folder );
527        }
528        m_LastUpdated = Instant.now( m_Clock );
529        writeString( m_File, dumpContents(), UTF8, CREATE, WRITE );
530    }   //  save()
531
532    /**
533     *  <p>{@summary Sets the clock that is used to determine the last
534     *  update.}</p>
535     *  <p>This is used only for testing purposes.</p>
536     *
537     *  @param  clock   The clock.
538     */
539    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
540    public final void setClock( final Clock clock )
541    {
542        m_Clock = requireNonNullArgument( clock, "clock" );
543        m_LastUpdated = Instant.now( clock );
544    }   //  setClock()
545
546    /**
547     *  {@inheritDoc}
548     */
549    @Override
550    public final void setValue( final String group, final String key, final String value )
551    {
552        @SuppressWarnings( "LocalVariableNamingConvention" )
553        final var g = m_Groups.computeIfAbsent( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ), this::createGroup );
554        g.setValue( key, value );
555    }   //  setValue()
556
557    /**
558     *  Splits a comment to the proper line length.
559     *
560     *  @param  comment The comment to split.
561     *  @return The lines for the comment.
562     */
563    public static final Collection<String> splitComment( final CharSequence comment )
564    {
565        final Collection<String> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
566
567        if( !requireNonNullArgument( comment, "comment" ).isEmpty() )
568        {
569            //noinspection ConstantExpression
570            breakText( comment, LINE_LENGTH - 2 )
571                .map( "# "::concat )
572                .map( String::trim )
573                .forEach( retValue::add );
574        }
575
576        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
577        return retValue;
578    }   //  splitComment()
579
580    /**
581     *  {@inheritDoc}
582     */
583    @Override
584    public final String toString() { return dumpContents(); }
585}
586//  class INIFileImpl
587
588/*
589 *  End of File
590 */
